form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/3/2023 A 430 343 PLACE DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA DATE OF EXAMINATION MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS At the request of the American Consul at CITY COUNTRY I certify that on the above date I examined NAME HUYNH BINH AGE SEX 60 F WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 503602 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: mother of LAPR Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage son Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious A 906 684 MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Insanity Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): PAROLED until Indef Purpose: Refuge [Officee] (Port) C 05-24-75 Date) D7 Chest X-ray report positive, Class B- Pulm Fibrosis - Plan- - report to county Health Dept. in consideration of INM. LM Dearth clear for INS from Dr. 5-20-25 Blood serological report NR from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) SIGNA URE OF MÃ‰DICAL TEOHNICAL ADVISOR SMSAMP from Dr. TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT FORM FS-398 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. 10-74
